meanings.definition: The quality or state of being open.
meanings.sent1: Her openness to different perspectives made her a great team player.
meanings.sent2: The openness of the book club allowed for diverse discussions.
meanings.sent3: The party's theme of 'openness' led to everyone wearing transparent clothing.
meanings.sent4: The openness of the sky after the storm was a welcome sight.
meanings.sent5: The openness of the field stretched out before us, inviting exploration.

meanings.definition: Willingness to consider new ideas or opinions.
meanings.sent1: His openness to trying new foods led him to discover his love for sushi.
meanings.sent2: The team's openness to feedback helped them improve their project.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed an unusual openness to wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an open field, ready to accept new ideas like seeds.
meanings.sent5: The openness of his heart allowed him to forgive easily.
